title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 543.6 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 543.6 - Records

State Regulations

The Office of Mental Health, on being made aware that the
basis under which a record was made available by the office to the National

Instant Criminal Background Check System does not apply or no longer applies, shall, as soon as practicable: (a) update, correct, modify or remove the record from any database that the Federal
or State government maintains and makes available to the National Instant

Criminal Background Check System, consistent with the rules pertaining to that
database; and
(b) notify the United

States Attorney General that such basis no longer applies so that the record
system in which the record is maintained is kept up to date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
543.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
